channel.title: water loss on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in water loss on funPlantGenes

item.title: BnCER1-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnCER1-2 Gene Name: Brassica napus clone CER1-2 aldehyde decarbonylase Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of BnKCS1-1, BnKCS1-2, and BnCER1-2 promotes cuticular wax production and increases drought tolerance in Brassica napus.

item.title: BnKCS1-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnKCS1-1 Gene Name: Brassica napus 3-ketoacyl-CoA synthase Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of BnKCS1-1, BnKCS1-2, and BnCER1-2 promotes cuticular wax production and increases drought tolerance in Brassica napus.

item.title: BnKCS1-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnKCS1-2 Gene Name: Brassica napus 3-ketoacyl-CoA synthase Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of BnKCS1-1, BnKCS1-2, and BnCER1-2 promotes cuticular wax production and increases drought tolerance in Brassica napus.

item.title: CaAIRE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA05g17640 Gene Symbol: CaAIRE1 Gene Name: ABA Induced RING-type E3 ligase 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Pepper E3 ligase CaAIRE1 promotes ABA sensitivity and drought tolerance by degradation of protein phosphatase CaAITP1.

item.title: CaWDP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaWDP1 Gene Name: WPP Domain Protein 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: The Pepper WPP Domain Protein, CaWDP1, Acts as a Novel Negative Regulator of Drought Stress via ABA Signaling.

item.title: CmNF-YB8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: UN088090 Gene Symbol: CmNF-YB8 Gene Name: Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CsATAF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa4M361820.1 Gene Symbol: CsATAF1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsATAF1 Positively Regulates Drought Stress Tolerance by an ABA-Dependent Pathway and by Promoting ROS Scavenging in Cucumber.

item.title: CsMYB96
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs5g10670.1 Gene Symbol: CsMYB96 Gene Name: R2R3 MYB transcription factor 96 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsMYB96 confers resistance to water loss in citrus fruit by simultaneous regulation of water transport and wax biosynthesis.

item.title: CsPLDα
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsPLDα Gene Name: Phospholipase D alpha Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cucumber Phospholipase D alpha (CsPLDα) gene overexpression in tobacco enhanced drought stress tolerance by regulating stomatal closure and lipid peroxidation.

item.title: CsWRKY40
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CSS004414 Gene Symbol: CsWRKY40 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 40 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor CsWRKY40 regulates L-theanine hydrolysis by activating the CsPDX2.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY17 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 17 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton WRKY Transcription Factor GhWRKY17 Functions in Drought and Salt Stress in Transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana Through ABA Signaling and the Modulation of Reactive Oxygen Species Production.

item.title: TaCIPK23
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaCIPK23 Gene Name: CBL-interacting protein kinase 23 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Wheat CBL-interacting protein kinase 23 (TaCIPK23) positively regulates drought stress and ABA responses TaCIPK23-overexpression wheat and Arabidopsis showed an higher survival rate under drought conditions with enhanced germination rate, developed root system, increased accumulation of osmolytes, and reduced water loss rate.

item.title: TaCYP707A1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaCYP707A1 Gene Name: ABA 8’-hydroxylase Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Ectopic expression of TaNCED2A and TaCYP707A1B in Arabidopsis resulted in altered seed ABA level and dormancy with no effect on leaf ABA content and transpirational water loss.

item.title: TaGSK3-3D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS3D02G137200 Gene Symbol: TaGSK3-3D Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaGSK3 regulates wheat development and stress adaptation through BR-dependent and BR-independent pathways.

item.title: TaNCED2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaNCED2 Gene Name: 9-cis-epoxycarotenoid dioxygenase2 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The present study identified the complete coding sequences of a second NCED gene, designated as TaNCED2, and its homeologues (TaNCED2A, TaNCED2B and TaNCED2D) in hexaploid wheat, and characterized its functionality in seed dormancy and leaf dehydration tolerance using the TaNCED2A homeologue.

item.title: TaSnRK2.10-4A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS4A02G235600.2 Gene Symbol: TaSnRK2.10-4A Gene Name: Sucrose non-fermenting 1-related protein kinase 2 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Sucrose non-fermenting 1-related protein kinase 2 (SnRK2) acts as a signaling hub in the response to drought stress, but whether SnRK2 helps plants cope with water deficit via other mechanisms is largely unknown.
